document_data.name: Ebon Claws
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Ebon Claws''' was an organization that attempted to wrestle control of [[Westgate]]'s criminal underbelly in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''A group of bloody fools calling themselves the Ebon Claws has decided to take on the Night Masks. Just like all the rest, these Ebon Claws won't last. The Night Masks rule Westgate's underworld with an iron fist.''|[[Little Davey]]}}
document_data.Base of Operations: According to a mad beggar named [[Salty Jack]], the Ebon Claws laired in the [[Sewers of Westgate]].
document_data.History: The Ebon Claws seemingly appeared out of nowhere in the {{YearlinkName|1374}} and started a guild war, giving a pretty good account of themselves. The infamous [[Night Masks]] quickly became the Ebon Claws' foes and the streets of Westgate began erupting into violence at night. The gang's alleged leader was [[Altama]], a female [[wererat]], however, the gang's true leader was a [[vampire]] named [[Tasheni]].
